Posts.Content: I am 34 years old . I am also a mother of 4 I was just diagnosed with breast  cancer . I am scared I need to find a local support group. To help me cope I live in Pleasent ville N.J  If anyone knows of any local groups please let me no I feel so alone .I am willing to fight this thing but it helps to no that I am not alone.
Posts.Title: What to expect
